examples.example: 只要每天努力一点点，我们就能不断进步，收获成功。

translate.english: As long as we work hard a little bit every day, we can make continuous progress and gain success.

examples.example: 只要坚持每天进步一点点，未来就会充满无限可能。

translate.english: As long as we insist on making a little progress every day, the future will be full of unlimited possibilities.

examples.example: 只要每天进步一点点，未来就会有很大的改变。

translate.english: As long as there is a little progress every day, there will be great changes in the future.
